name: BiKE (JLteam456)
description:
Take on thrilling challenges and race through daring tracks filled with obstacles and stunning scenery.  Customize your bike to match your style and upgrade your skills to become the ultimate champion. As you play, you'll earn rewards that unlock exciting game updates, including new bikes, tracks, and challenges.

But the excitement doesn't end there. We're hosting a series of game jams, giving you the chance to showcase your skills and create your own unique levels and themes. The best creator will earn the opportunity to publish their game on a major gaming platform of their choice for free for life. So rev up your engines and get ready to ride into the winner's circle!
